items.title: Added teasertitle and teaserkicker to the k5ameta object
items.description: Added the teaserTitle and teaserKicker to the k5ameta object. In the Object it will be called "teaserTitle" and "kicker"

items.title: Added new admin for adding a custom sesamy pop up instead of the default
items.description: Added a new admin for adding a custom sesamy pop up. This will replace the default pop up

items.title: Roxen export: Strip characters
items.description: When exporting articles to the Roxen print system the character for soft hyphen (`u00ad`) is now removed.

items.title: Combined date and time inputs and added validation
items.description: Date and time in article settings are now handled as one datetime input with validation to avoid saving improperly formatted dates.

items.title: Fix duplicate ads rendering
items.description: Ensures ads do not appear multiple times on the same page, improving ad display consistency for Labrador CMS users.

items.title: Add custom event for skyscraper ad reload
items.description: Introduces a custom event when skyscraper ads reload, allowing better tracking and integration with ad services.

items.title: Center kicker alignment with padding
items.description: Improves visual alignment of kickers by adding padding, enhancing aesthetics for article layouts.

items.title: Disable AI disclaimer for prompt generation
items.description: Adds a button to allow users to skip the AI disclaimer when generating prompts, streamlining workflow.

items.title: Fix canonical link on error pages
items.description: Corrects canonical link output for 404 and 410 error pages, helping search engines index correctly.

items.title: Fix typo for March in all languages
items.description: Ensures the month of March is displayed correctly in all language files and date code.

items.title: Added Reddit and Whatsapp share buttons. Added default styling to all SoMe icons
items.description: Introduces a button for sharing articles directly to Reddit and Whatsapp, expanding social sharing options. Changed Glimta, Talandwebb and Copy buttons to match the styling of the rest of the SoMe icons

items.title: Integrate Adnuntius ads
items.description: Better support for Adnuntius advertising network in the Mailmojo template, giving publishers more ad options.

items.title: Hide empty Google ads
items.description: Empty Google ad slots are now hidden on pages to avoid unsightly gaps in layouts.

items.title: Correct article date settings
items.description: Fixes issues with article date settings so published dates display accurately.

items.title: Improve mobile kicker spacing
items.description: Mobile kickers now have proper padding and margin when backgrounds are removed, enhancing mobile appearance.

items.title: Fix expandable caption rendering
items.description: Expandable captions are now displayed correctly in articles, improving user experience.

items.title: Fix article layout spacing
items.description: Resolves spacing issues in articles for a cleaner and more professional appearance.

items.title: Add oEmbed support
items.description: Allows rich media embedding in articles using oEmbed standard, broadening content possibilities. You can add the argument `?lab_viewport=oembed` to articles to return the page as oEmbed. Options for the embed are available through the URL.

items.title: Fix infinite scroll updates
items.description: Addresses issues with infinite scroll for smoother article loading.

items.title: Add Ritzau article search
items.description: Adds the ability to search for Ritzau articles, expanding news sourcing capabilities.

items.title: Prevent rapid skyscraper ad reloads
items.description: Implements a flag to stop skyscraper ads from reloading too quickly, improving ad stability.

items.title: Added language support for US
items.description: Added language support for US, only date time format was changed compared to GB

items.title: Add unified date display admin option
items.description: Adds a checkbox in admin settings to enable unified date display in articles.

items.title: Fix article share text
items.description: Corrects the share text for articles to ensure proper display on social media.

items.title: Remove z-index from horseshoe ads
items.description: Removes z-index settings from horseshoe ads to prevent layout issues.

items.title: Show section on articles
items.description: Adds an option to display the section on articles, improving clarity for readers.

items.title: Improve menu item targeting
items.description: Enhances menu item targeting for more precise navigation and customization.
